name: Automaton (itch) (CodingTiger)
description:
DESCRIPTION

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A game about a robot.

A game about an automaton.

A game about a helpless automaton surviving against the harsh weather and robots that have turned evil. Struggling for survival, the robot creates machines that will help it to survive and defend itself.

This is a game about SURVIVAL.

  INSTRUCTIONS

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WASD to move

Each machine costs five scraps to build.

Machines are located in the shop.

You can place machines by clicking on the shop text, then clicking on the corresponding button for the machine you want to build, then clicking anywhere on the screen to place in that spot.

Press E to gather from dead robots and cars.

The wind turbine power drills, oil extractors, and sentries.

The drill produces scraps.

The oil extractor produces oil

The sentry defends you from evil robots.

The storage is necessary for storing and collecting oil and scraps, or your drills and extractors will be useless.

Evil robots will attack you and leech oil from you.

Oil is your lifeline. Once you run out of it, you're dead.
